Question & Options:
Which characters are involved in the relationship dynamics in the plot of the movie?
Options:
A. Raja Yadav
B. Sonia
C. Baba Kadam
D. All of the above

What can be inferred about the relationships between Raja Yadav, Sonia, and Baba Kadam in the context of the movie?
Options:
A. Raja Yadav is in love with Sonia.
B. Sonia works for Baba Kadam.
C. Baba Kadam abandons Raja and Sonia.
D. Raja Yadav and Baba Kadam are friends.
Correct Answer: Raja Yadav is in love with Sonia, Sonia works for Baba Kadam, Baba Kadam abandons Raja and Sonia.

Options:
A. Rajan Nayak
B. Raja Yadav
C. Politician Shrivastav
D. All of the above

What are the relationships between Raja, Rajan Nayak, and Sonia in the context of the story?
Options:
A. Raja is in love with Sonia.
B. Rajan Nayak has contracted a police inspector to kill Raja and Sonia.
C. Sonia works for a drug dealer named Baba Kadam.
D. Raja and Rajan Nayak are allies in the drug trade.
Correct Answer: a) Raja is in love with Sonia. and b) Rajan Nayak has contracted a police inspector to kill Raja and Sonia. and c) Sonia works for a drug dealer named Baba Kadam.
